    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        The initial setup. Called before every test. It creates a new Board.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • testIsField

        public void testIsField()
        Tests for several inputs if it is a field on the Board or not. Both tested with existing fields and non existing fields.

      • testgetField

        public void testgetField()
        Test for the getField method. It should return the PlayerColor of a field. Tested with a none existing field, an empty field and a colored field.

      • testIsEmptyField

        public void testIsEmptyField()
        Test for the isEmptyField method. Tests if a field is empty. First checked two empty fields, after that colored those fields and checked those again

      • testIsFull

        public void testIsFull()
        Tests if the board is full. Start with an empty board. Filled the board and called the method again.

      • testCountHorizontal

        public void testCountHorizontal()
        Test for the horizontalCount. The method checks if there is a row of four on the horizontal. First check for a stone with no row, and then create a row and check again.

      • testVerticalCount

        public void testVerticalCount()
        Test for the verticalCount. Checks if there is a vertical row of four. First check for a stone with no row, then create a vertical row and check again.

      • testCountDiagonalLeft

        public void testCountDiagonalLeft()
        Test for the diagonalLeftCount. Checks if there is a diagonal row of four from right to left. First check for a stone with no row, then create a diagonal row and check again.

      • testCountDiagonalRight

        public void testCountDiagonalRight()
        Test for the diagonalRightCount. Checks if there is a diagonal row from left to right. First check for a stone with no row, then create a diagonal row and check again.

      • testCheckForFreeSpot

        public void testCheckForFreeSpot()
        Test for the checkForFreeSpot. It should make sure that a stone will be always at the lowest point of a column. So first an empty row, then set some fields, check again, set some more fields and check again.
